column4: It's like vista has completely blocked anything and everything on the cd.
I tried to explore it from the windows explorer, nothing. I right clicked and opened it, a window came up and closed. I tried to cd into it from the dos, it gave an i/o error
Microsoft probably thinks this is a "feature" for linux users. Allows them to think less about the complexities of which OS to choose.. They are right... "switches to full Linux box"
